name: lmodbn0

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, clmod), wne(c1, emptycls), wcel(c0, cgrp))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, clmod), wne(c1, emptycls))
-| wi(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c0, cgrp))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cgrp), wne(c1, emptycls))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ LMod → c1 ≠ ∅)
⊣ (c0 ∈ LMod → c0 ∈ Grp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Grp → c1 ≠ ∅)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, clmod), wne(c1, emptycls))
-| wi(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c0, cgrp))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cgrp), wne(c1, emptycls))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ LMod → c1 ≠ ∅)
⊣ (c0 ∈ LMod → c0 ∈ Grp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Grp → c1 ≠ ∅)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, clmod), wne(c1, emptycls))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cgrp), wne(c1, emptycls))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cgrp), wne(c1, emptycls))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, clmod), wne(c1, emptycls))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))

comment: The base set of a left module is nonempty. (Contributed by NM, 8-Dec-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.)
